title: Brought to Light - Two graphic novels
description:
30 YEARS OF DRUG SMUGGLING, ARMS DEALS AND COVERT OPERATIONS THAT ROBBED AMERICA AND BETRAYED THE CONSTITUTION
-TWO BOOKS IN ONE-

Shadowplay - the secret team

By Alan moore and Bill Sienkiewicz
Based on the shocking lawsuit filed by the Cristic institute
Introduction by Daniel Shehan

Flashpoint: The La Penca Bombing

Matha Honey, Tony Avirgan and The Cristic Institute
As told to Joyce Brabner and Thomas Yeates


Made by well-respected writers and artists, the information this comic brings is the reason you haven't seen it widely available.

It was published by Eclipse (out-of-business since mid-1990s, R.I.P.), who also made "Real War Stories" and box-sets of political trading cards:

"Bush League" : secrets of the 1st Bush administration
"Drug Wars" : the CIA connections to drug traffickers
"Friendly Dictators" : bloody, oppressive US-allied regimes
"Rotten to the Core" : dirt behind early '90s NYC politics
"Iran-Contra Scandal" : dealings of Ollie North and assoc.
"Coup D'etat" : the JFK assassination
"S & L Scandal" : Neil Bush & pals billion-$ theft


"Brought to Light" was published as two books joined at their endings and flipped, so that finishing one brought the reader to the upside-down end of the other story.

It starts here with 'Shadowplay', and when you reach the cover of Flashpoint, this represents turning over the original.
